headline: Raymond James downgrades Danaher on murky growth outlook
summary: Investing.com -- Raymond James downgraded Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR) to "Market Perform" from "Outperform," citing concerns over the company's growth trajectory following its fourth-quarter results and guidance that lagged peers.
